abstract: Robert Pickering has resigned from his post as chief executive of Cazenove, the British bank, in a surprise move that has triggered speculation about its future.
lead_paragraph: Robert Pickering has resigned from his post as chief executive of Cazenove, the British bank, in a surprise move that has triggered speculation about its future.

headline.main: Cazenove Boss Resigns Amid Reported Tensions With JPMorgan
